<title level="1" right="Rules">[Low-Light Vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 465 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A creature with low-light vision can see in dim light as though it were bright light, so it ignores the concealed condition due to dim light.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
